title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather, document, and prioritize the functional and non-functional requirements for the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform. Identify key features, user personas, use cases, edge cases, error handling mechanisms, performance optimization strategies, and scalability considerations. Ensure adherence to best practices for maintainability and modularity.

title: Design System Architecture
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations or third-party services. Consider the following aspects:

- Modular and scalable architecture to accommodate future growth and changes
- Separation of concerns between frontend, backend, and database layers
- Robust API design for communication between frontend and backend
- Database schema design for efficient data storage and retrieval
- Integration with third-party services for authentication, notifications, or other functionalities
- Security considerations, such as data encryption, access controls, and input validation
- Performance optimizations, caching strategies, and load balancing
- Deployment and infrastructure requirements (e.g., containerization, cloud hosting)
- Monitoring, logging, and error handling mechanisms

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend components for the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend logic, APIs, and services for the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solution for the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Implement Collaboration and Team Formation Logic
description: Develop the core algorithms and logic for identifying collaboration opportunities and facilitating team formation.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop user authentication and authorization mechanisms to secure the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the frontend, backend, and core logic components of the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Conduct Integration Testing
description: Perform end-to-end integration testing to ensure the seamless functioning of the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CrossFunctionalCollaborator platform, including user guides, developer documentation, and deployment instructions.
